description:
On a quest for Immortali Tea to save sickly Melonia, Chup and friends encounter the fierce, fiery Fearnix. This giant bird has the power to cause its victims to witness unsavory parts of their past. The Fearnix targets Gobson first. Then, Gobson’s royal backstory is exposed in all its juicy details.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴブリンになった王子
